subsection.subsection.Title: Features
subsection.subsection.Subtitle: Explore the amazing features of our application.
subsection.subsection.FeatureDescription: A prebuilt design system that is easy to use and customize, with type safety
subsection.subsection.FeatureTitleTwo: Premade file and folder structure for scalability
subsection.subsection.FeatureDescriptionTwo: A premade file and folder structure that is scalable and easy to use for any project, big or small.
subsection.subsection.FeatureDescriptionThree: A dark mode and light mode that is easy to use and customize, with type safety.
subsection.subsection.FeatureDescriptionFour: A prebuilt design system that is easy to use and customize, with type safety.

informationalVideos.informationalVideos.Title: How to Play Warcraft III Risk Reforged
informationalVideos.informationalVideos.Subtitle: Watch these informative videos to understand how to play and master the game!
informationalVideos.informationalVideos.VideoTitle1: Getting Started with Warcraft III Risk
informationalVideos.informationalVideos.VideoDescription1: Learn the basics of the game, how to set up, and the initial strategies to win.
informationalVideos.informationalVideos.VideoDescription2: Take your gameplay to the next level with advanced strategies and tactics.
informationalVideos.informationalVideos.VideoDescription3: Learn how to work with your team in multiplayer mode and outsmart your opponents.
informationalVideos.informationalVideos.VideoDescription4: Explore the various game modes available in Warcraft III Risk and how to best use them.
